00018 Segmenter::Segmenter ()
00019     :   inkValue_(0),
00020         shapes_(std::vector<Shape>(0)),
00021         thresholdingTime_(0.0),
00022         floodFillingTime_(0.0),
00023         seeds_(std::list<Pixel>(0))
00024 {
00025     
00026 };

00029 
00034 void Segmenter::applyThreshold (Clip &clip, const unsigned char &threshold, const unsigned char &backgroundReference)
00035 {
00036     // Start timing
00037     boost::timer timer;
00038     timer.restart();
00039     
00040     
00041     // Threshold every pixel
00042     for (unsigned int i=0; i < clip.height(); ++i)
00043     {
00044         for (unsigned int j=0; j < clip.width(); ++j)
00045         {
00046             unsigned char grayLevel = clip(i, j);
00047             
00048             if ( (backgroundReference >= threshold) and (grayLevel >= threshold) )  // The background is near white
00049                 clip(i, j) = 255;
00050             else
00051             {
00052                 if ( (backgroundReference >= threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )
00053                     clip(i, j) = 0;
00054                 else
00055                 {
00056                     if ( (backgroundReference < threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )    // The background is near black
00057                         clip(i, j) = 0;
00058                     else
00059                         clip(i, j) = 255;
00060                 }
00061             }   
00062         }
00063     }
00064     
00065     
00066     // Stablish the value of the ink pixels
00067     if ( backgroundReference >= threshold )
00068         inkValue_ = 0;
00069     else
00070         inkValue_ = 255;
00071     
00072     // Gather elapsed time
00073     thresholdingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00074 };

00083 void Segmenter::applyFloodFill (const Clip &clip)
00084 {
00085     // Start timing
00086     boost::timer timer;
00087     timer.restart();
00088     
00089     // Find the seeds where the flooding process will start from
00090     findSeeds(clip);
00091     
00092     // Explore the neighbourhood of each seed. Since a subset of seeds are removed for each shape, the
00093     // 'while' style avoids to make an error by modifying a list that is being reading
00094     while ( seeds_.size() > 0 )
00095     {
00096         shapes_.push_back(Shape());
00097         exploreSeedNeighbourhood(*(seeds_.begin()), clip);
00098     }
00099     
00103 
00104     
00105     // Gather elapsed time
00106     floodFillingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00107 };

00110 
00115 void Segmenter::findSeeds (const Clip &clip)
00116 {
00117     // Explore the whole clip adding the ink pixels
00118     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < clip.height(); ++i )
00119     {
00120         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < clip.width(); ++j )
00121         {
00122             if ( clip(i, j) == inkValue_ )
00123                 seeds_.push_back(Pixel(i, j));
00124         }
00125     }
00126 };

00129 
00133 bool Segmenter::isSeed (const Pixel& pixel) const
00134 {
00135     if( static_cast<int>(std::count(seeds_.begin(), seeds_.end(), pixel)) > 0 )
00136         return true;
00137     else
00138         return false;
00139 };

00141 
00142 
00146 void Segmenter::exploreSeedNeighbourhood (const Pixel &seed, const Clip &clip)
00147 {
00148     // Check that seed's coordinates fall inside the clip
00149     if ( (seed.first < 0) or (seed.first >= clip.height()) )
00150         return;
00151     
00152     if ( (seed.second < 0) or (seed.second >= clip.width()) )
00153         return;
00154 
00155 
00156     // Test this pixel has a gray level equal to the character's ink value
00157     if ( clip(seed.first, seed.second) not_eq inkValue_ )
00158         return;
00159         
00160     // Test this pixel has already been explored
00161     if ( not isSeed(seed) )
00162         return;
00163     
00164     
00165     // Save the coordinates and remove this seed from the list
00166     unsigned int x = seed.first, y = seed.second;
00167     seeds_.remove(seed);
00168 
00169 
00170     // Recursive calls
00171     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x, y+1), clip );    // East
00172     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x, y-1), clip );    // West
00173     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x+1, y), clip );    // South
00174     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x-1, y), clip );    // North
00175     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x+1, y+1), clip );  // South-East
00176     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x+1, y-1), clip );  // South-West
00177     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x-1, y+1), clip );  // North-East
00178     exploreSeedNeighbourhood( Pixel(x-1, y-1), clip );  // North-West
00179 };
